law.catch_line: Method of publication of list -- Contents.
law.text: The list may be published by any medium or method. The list may contain the name, address, type of tax or fee, and period for which payment is due for each liability, including penalties, interest, and other charges owed by each listed delinquent taxpayer.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 366, sec. 10, effective January 1, 2003.
